name: Venom Hydra
text: If this card is Summoned, you can add 1 "Venom" card from your Deck to your hand. (Quick Effect): You can target 1 monster your opponent controls; place 1 Venom counter on that card. Monsters with Venom counters cannot attack or activate their effects. Whilst there are 3 or more Venom counters on the field: You can tribute this card; Special Summon 1 "Vennominaga the Deity of Poisonous Snakes" from your hand, Deck, or GY ignoring summoning conditions.
